skills.name: frontend-design
skills.title: frontend-design
skills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, or applications. Generates creative, polished code that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: skill-creator
skills.title: skill-creator
skills.description: Guide for creating effective skills. This skill should be used when users want to create a new skill (or update an existing skill) that extends Claude's capabilities with specialized knowledge, workflows, or tool integrations.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: article-data-extractor
skills.title: article-data-extractor
skills.description: Extract and organize numerical data from news articles and analytical content into comprehensive Markdown tables. Use when users need to analyze article data, convert articles to structured data formats, or create data summaries from written content. Identifies numbers, percentages, statistics, metrics, rankings, and time-series data with full context (entities, timeframes, sources) organized into categorized tables.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: comics-creator-skill
skills.title: comics-creator-skill
skills.description: No description
skills.author: Unknown
inputs_required: Natural language request describing the comic
Example: "A 5-panel ghost story about a cat"
Should include: plot, tone, character hints, panel count preference
duration: total runtime preference ("short", "medium", "long", or "2 min")
ai_config: JSON dict with specific bot selections (see AI Configuration section)
outputs_provided: request_analysis.json: Parsed user input (story, type, tone, panels, duration)
script_data.json: Full panel script with image descriptions and captions
asset_urls.json: Generated image and audio URLs per panel

skills.name: craft-multi-doc-api
skills.title: craft-multi-doc-api
skills.description:
Creative Craft Multi-Document API mastery solving auth complexity, silent failures, pagination hell, bulk op inconsistencies. 
Use for document automation, AI-enhanced content pipelines, multi-doc orchestration with battle-tested workflows, 
creative doc generation patterns, and painpoint mitigations that make complex ops feel effortless.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: craft-template-designer
skills.title: craft-template-designer
skills.description:
Beautiful Craft template design system with glassmorphism, neumorphism, and minimalist patterns.
Use for creating stunning page templates, dashboards, and landing pages. Includes API payloads, 
visual mockups, color systems, and code generation scripts for instant Craft deployment.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: framer-code-transformer
skills.title: framer-code-transformer
skills.description: Transform React/TypeScript code for Framer design-to-dev workflow in both directions. Converts production code with complex imports and dependencies into clean, isolated components ready for Framer design implementation. Also converts Framer-generated code back to production-ready React/TypeScript. Use this skill when developers or designers need to exchange code between production environments and Framer prototyping—removing unnecessary imports, resolving dependencies, cleaning up boilerplate, and ensuring code is immediately usable without refactoring.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: frontend-design-react
skills.title: frontend-design-react
skills.description: Create distinctive, production-grade React interfaces with Tailwind CSS and custom dark space theme. Specializes in application pages (APIKeys, Pricing, Profile, etc.) with glassmorphism effects and sophisticated animations. Avoids generic AI aesthetics through intentional design choices.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: poe-script-bot
skills.title: poe-script-bot
skills.description: Build Poe Script Bots using the Poe Python API. Includes complete API reference, workflow patterns, and production-ready examples. Use when creating scripts for Poe bots, handling messages, calling other bots, working with attachments, managing conversations, or implementing tool-calling workflows. Covers message/chat management, bot orchestration, streaming responses, parallel execution, and error handling.
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: poe-script-creator
skills.title: poe-script-creator
skills.description: Create, template, and debug Poe Script Bots with structured workflows. Generates production-ready Python scripts with proper error handling, bot orchestration patterns, and attachment management. Use when building new Poe bots, converting existing code to Poe scripts, or implementing complex multi-bot workflows. Includes templates for common patterns (bot calls, streaming, tool-calling, parallel execution, chat management).
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: workflow-agent-ideator
skills.title: Workflow Agent Ideator
skills.description:
AI-powered workflow generator that creates 2-3 action automation workflows (Trigger → Action → Output/Notification).
Analyzes user requirements by topic and recommends the best platform with specific implementation guidance.
Includes practical capacity and cost information for each platform's free tier.
skills.author: Your Team

skills.title: generic-script-bot-creator
skills.description: No description
skills.author: Unknown

skills.name: strategic-thinking-toolkit
skills.title: Strategic Thinking Toolkit
skills.description:
Comprehensive framework for deep analysis using 5 proven thinking models:
5 Whys (root cause analysis), SWOT (strategic positioning), PESTEL (external factors),
SCAMPER (creative innovation), and Six Thinking Hats (multi-perspective decision-making).
Use when solving complex problems, planning strategy, or need structured thinking.
skills.author: Strategic Analysis Team
inputs_required: Problem/Topic: Clear statement of what needs analysis
Available Data: Facts, metrics, team feedback (optional but recommended)
Model Selection: Which framework(s) fit your situation:

skills.name: bl1nk-prompt-engin
skills.title: BL1NK Prompt Engineer - Bilingual Video Creation Prompt Generator
skills.description:
Specialized bilingual video prompt generator (Thai + English) that creates production-ready prompts 
for video creators. Accepts Thai/English descriptions and optional reference images. Generates Thai 
summary, final cinematic prompts, and detailed timeline breakdowns with camera movements, dialogue, 
and mood cues. Perfect for video production, AI video generation, and cinematic storytelling.
skills.author: Video Creation Team

skills.name: bl1nk-prompt-engineer
skills.title: BL1NK Prompt Engineer - Bilingual Custom Prompt Creator
skills.description:
Specialized AI Prompt Engineer for creating professional custom AI prompts in bilingual format (Thai + English).
Analyzes user requirements and generates structured, production-ready prompts following proven prompt engineering standards.
Ideal for content creators, developers, and anyone needing to create effective AI commands with clear role, action, and requirements.
skills.author: AI Prompt Engineering Team

skills.name: bl1nk-once-ui-designer
skills.title: bl1nk Once UI Designer - Production-Grade React Component Generator
skills.description:
Professional UI component and page generator following the "Once UI" design philosophy. 
Creates pixel-perfect React/TypeScript components with Tailwind CSS, dark mode elegance, 
cyan accent colors, and glassmorphism effects. Specializes in landing pages, authentication 
flows, dashboards, documentation hubs, and component systems for the bl1nk Web Portal ecosystem.
skills.author: bl1nk Design System Team

skills.name: skill-orchestration-api
skills.title: Skill Orchestration API - CLI for AI-Driven Skill Execution
skills.description:
Intelligent API system that maps user scenarios to appropriate skills and executes them via CLI.
Analyzes context, triggers, and requirements to automatically select and run the right skill with
proper parameters. Features semantic skill matching, dependency resolution, parameter validation,
and execution monitoring. Perfect for creating AI workflows that intelligently delegate tasks.
skills.author: AI Orchestration Team
